tu.example: Tu vuoi venire al cinema con noi?
tu.example_english: Do you want to come to the movies with us?

lui.example_english: She wants to become a doctor.

noi.example_english: We want to go on vacation.

voi.example_english: Do you want to eat pizza?

loro.example: Loro vogliono comprare una casa nuova.
loro.example_english: They want to buy a new house.

io.example: Domani vorrò riposare tutto il giorno.
io.example_english: Tomorrow I will want to rest all day.

tu.example: Tu vorrai sicuramente provare questo dolce.
tu.example_english: You will surely want to try this dessert.

lui.example: Lei vorrà tornare a casa presto.
lui.example_english: She will want to go home early.

noi.example_english: We will want a bigger car.

voi.example: Voi vorrete aiuto con i compiti.
voi.example_english: You will want help with homework.

loro.example_english: They will want to know the truth.

io.example: Ho voluto comprare quel libro da molto tempo.
io.example_english: I have wanted to buy that book for a long time.

tu.example_english: Have you always wanted to be an architect?

lui.example: Lei ha voluto aiutare i suoi amici.
lui.example_english: She wanted to help her friends.

noi.example: Abbiamo voluto restare a casa stasera.
noi.example_english: We wanted to stay home tonight.

voi.example_english: Did you want to visit that museum?

loro.example: Hanno voluto provare la cucina italiana.
loro.example_english: They wanted to try Italian cuisine.

participio_passato.example: Il risultato voluto è stato ottenuto.
participio_passato.example_english: The desired result has been achieved.

context: Modal verb expressing desire, wish, or intention
